title: Len Saldua
author: Len Saldua
content: I know JEWEL is only on the Harmony ONE chain, so can someone tell me how to buy it ? I guess I need to get the Harmony One wallet ?

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: You can look at the different markets where you can buy it https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/defi-kingdoms/markets/I think you should read more about the token or ecosystem before you put your money into it - https://docs.defikingdoms.com/or ask more urgent questions in their chatsTelegram - https://t.me/defikingdomsDiscord - https://discord.gg/defikingdoms

comments.author: X-ray
comments.body: It's better if you are using MEXC to buy such token. JEWEL was also available in some blockchains like DFK chain or avalanche https://medium.com/defi-kingdoms-official/defi-kingdoms-new-features-and-expansion-as-announced-at-avalanche-summit-eea5d1e831fbYou can setting up your metamask to use DFK or avalanche. Harmony was good too but i prefer to use avalanche. It's better if you are asking telegram mod if you are feeling doubt about that. The community was quite big now. People are also actively doing conversation in the telegram group.
